{"id":957872523,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1685128256,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/957872523/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array","memory":"18.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int removeDuplicates(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int countDuplicates = 0;\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            if (nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) {\n                countDuplicates++;\n            } else {\n                // If they are not equal, it means a new element is encountered. \n                // Shift the current element nums[i] to the left by countDuplicates \n                // positions, effectively removing the duplicates before it.\n                nums[i - countDuplicates] = nums[i];\n            }\n        }\n        //Return the number of unique elements in the vector.\n        return (nums.size() - countDuplicates);\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"remove-duplicates-from-sorted-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
